#include <bits/stdc++.h>

#define ll long long
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define ____ ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
ll mod = 1000000007ll;

using namespace std;

vector<int> v;

int calc()
{
    vector<int> store;
    for (int i = 0; i < v.size(); i++)
    {
        auto it = upper_bound(store.begin(), store.end(), v[i]);
        if (it == store.end())
            store.pb(v[i]);
        else
            *it = v[i];
    }
    int ans = (int)store.size();
    return max(ans, 1);
}

int main()
{
    //freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin);
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while (t--)
    {
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        int dp[n];
        int ans = 1;
        int arr[n];
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
            cin>>arr[i];
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            dp[i] = 1;
        }
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            for(int j=0;j<i;j++)
            {
                if(arr[j]<=arr[i])
                {
                    if(dp[i]<dp[j]+1)
                    {
                        dp[i] = dp[j]+1;
                        ans = max(dp[i], ans);
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        printf("%d\n", ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
